title: Personalized Language Learning Design Using Predictive Analytics in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and language learning experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design that enhances language acquisition efficiency through analysis of learner engagement in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can describe three or more patterns of their language learning using predictive analytics tools.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate a 20% improvement in achievement when participating in learning three or more times per week in a mobile environment.
Learners can develop personalized learning plans based on prior knowledge levels and technical proficiency.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
